messages.subject: commentary on unknown rant
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/31/03 1:07:22 AM Central Standard Time, AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/31/03 1:07:22 AM Central Standard Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< But unfortunately, people like that do give homeschooling a bad
reputation,
and I'm not proud to be associated with them. >>

I thought Dr. Laura wrote it (which would explain all the BS written there)
but it wasn't?
Or was it something she just shared on her show?
The only good part about the article is where it said close the schools!! :)

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson
Burnett
